title: Crafted ward skin not showing up in inventory
body:
I crafted a banner of the horse ward skin into a permanent, but it doesn't show up anywhere on my account (and has disappeared from my hextech inventory). 

Any remedies available to the situation?

replies.body:
As *Rineyy* mentioned, we're aware of this issue which affects a small number of wards, *Banner of the Horse* being one of them. The skin will not be selectable in champ select or show up anywhere visible on your account, but it's purely a visual issue and the ward is still on your account. We're currently tracking this and investigating into a fix, which I don't have a timeline for when that will roll out. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

My friend got his first chests today (the two you get at level 5) and he unlocked the Sanguine Garen skin with orange essence and he owns Garen but, when he tried to equip the skin in champion select it said unlock. Is this is the same problem with the wards?

There's no issue with missing Champion Skins as far as I'm aware of. I recommend you have your friend [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account specialists can take a look and see what's going on.
It was my mistake x) we both thought he had upgraded the skin but, it wasn't! Is there anymore updates on the Banner of the Horse ward skin though?

I just finished both of the new missions for the new "DEATH SWORN" icon and ward, I received the icon just fine but my ward is missing.
I unlocked it with orange essence and it is not in my ward section? when and how can it be unlocked?
There is currently a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins, you still own them but you don't see them. A fix for this bug is under development.
